item.description: Below are animation examples for web and TV. Happy New 2016 Greeting based on my 10 year old sons’ drawings. Based on my 8 year old sons’ drawings. -- Happy Thanksgiving Animated escape of the turkey from the Thanksgiving table. Autumn Made after the painting of classic Bulgarian artist Vladimir Dimitrov Majstora. Credits: Conceived, written, directed and animated by Todor Radev. “I am the mop”

I have designed and animated a ton of games. Here are some recent examples of user interface and background artwork for mobile and desktop games. Interface for Sherlock Holmes Hidden Object game by Oxford University Press Jack and the Beanstalk Hidden Object game by Oxford University Press Background artwork of a Reading Room for Secret Builders online virtual world for kids Background artwork of a Hallway for Secret Builders online virtual world for kids

Here are some examples of graphic design for apps and websites. Corporate identity development. Client: Cliver Advertising for a streaming video startup. Logo development of an app. Kickstarter campaign artwork for a movie Kickstarter campaign artwork for a movie
